body:
Hey Avicers,
We're trying to get this big on Avicus, so please try to help get this a thing! :D

The challenge is:
Place as many buttons on a map as possible!

Here is a small example:

http://imgur.com/uBcMsyT

Good luck!!

title: I Dare You! [PushMyButtonChallenge]

replies.body:
Not true (I think), in the past, teams have worked together to cover massive amounts of void, and that was a challenge. I don't see why it shouldn't be allowed here, not like it's hurting anyone.

Can we get a Sr. Mod opinion here?
